login.title: Wooden Furniture
login.subtitle: Login to continue
login.validity.patternMismatch: Login must start with a letter and contain only letters and digits
login.validity.tooShort: Login must contain at least 6 characters
login.password.validity.patternMismatch: Password must contain at least one capital letter and one special character
login.password.validity.tooShort: Password must contain at least 8 characters
register.title: Create your account
register.validity.person.patternMismatch: Field must start with a capital letter and contain only letters
register.validity.number.min: Field must be a positive integer
register.confirm.title: Congratulations!
register.confirm.first: Your account has been successfully created! We have just sent an activation link to your registered email address. Once your account is activated, you will be able to log in and start exploring our widerange of furniture collections.
register.confirm.second: We hope you find what you're looking for and enjoy shopping with us!
register.confirm.third: If you have already verified your account,
reset.password.title: Reset your password
reset.password.success: Your password has been reset, you can log in
account.confirmation.success: Your account has been verified and you can now log in
dialog.confirmation.title: Confirm action
dialog.confirmation.register.message: Are you sure you want to sign up?
dialog.confirmation.password.message: Are you sure you want to reset your password?
exception.mok.account.login.already.exis: Account with given login already exists
exception.mok.account.email.already.exis: Account with given email already exists
forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this resource
exception.mok.account.old.password: New password cannot be the same as the old one
exception.expired.password.reset.link: Your password reset link has expired, try again
exception.mok.account.already.verified: Your account has already been verified
exception.expired.account.confirmation.l: Confirmation link has expired and your account has been deleted
notfound.title: Page not found
notfound.description: Page you are trying to access does not exist...
